E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 4/28/1974
Subject: Good Game
Hello,
The fact that we won on a promotion day seems
to have a positive effect on our fan interest!
It increased slightly.

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Friday, 5/2/1974
Subject: Status of Craig Kusick
Dear Sir,
Craig Kusick shouldn't play at AA Pittsfield Rangers!
He has an AVG of .243 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
